titleStmt.title: Monthly preparations for the Holy Communion by R.B. ; to which is added suitable meditations before, in, and after receiving ; with divine hymns in common tunes, fitted for publick congregations or private families.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard Baxter. Cf. BM.
"Preface to the reader" signed: Matthew Sylvester.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
